title: Effect of increase in labor costs in car industry

content.question: If labor costs rise in the automobile industry, which of the following will happen to car prices and the quantity of cars sold?

choices.label:
Price
 Quantity Sold

Increase
 Not change

topic.text: 1.6: Market Equilibrium, Disequilibrium, and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
